Sentencas: Barium cerate is viewed as one of the advanced high temperature proton conductors, while the chemical stability of such a material is vulnerable in air at high temperatures.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of a double-layer electrolyte membrane for BaCeO3-based reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs)

Sentencas: In this work, a double-layer electrolyte membrane was prepared by dip-coating an additional layer of BaZr0.8Y0.2O3-delta (BZY2) on a BaCe0.8Y0.2O3-delta (BCY2) layer.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of a double-layer electrolyte membrane for BaCeO3-based reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs)

Sentencas: The effects of the additional BZY2 layer on the phase composition, the electrolyte morphology and the electrical properties of whole electrolyte membrane have been systematically investigated.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of a double-layer electrolyte membrane for BaCeO3-based reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs)

Sentencas: The results showed that the double-layer electrolyte membrane had a layered structure.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of a double-layer electrolyte membrane for BaCeO3-based reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs)

Sentencas: The anode-supported single cell using this double layer electrolyte exhibited a greatly improved chemical stability.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of a double-layer electrolyte membrane for BaCeO3-based reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs)

Sentencas: These results demonstrated that this double layer electrolyte had a great potential to be used as a stable proton conductor with an acceptable conductivity for reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs).
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of a double-layer electrolyte membrane for BaCeO3-based reversible solid oxide cells (RSOCs)
